error.failedToLoadData: The app failed to load data from the server. Please try again later.
error.failedToAccessGeolocation: The map failed to load automatically as location service is denied.

notice.apiIsInBeta: Service is in beta. There may be inaccuracies and delays (+/- 5 min).
notice.publicMaskShutdown: As mask stocks have stabilized, the public mask program will stop on July 12th. Masks can be purchased from pharmacies, supermarkets, online, and convenience stores without limitations. As a result, the mask map service will also shut down. Thank you.

maskBuyAlertWeekday: Today ({{dayOfWeek}}): Birth year end digit {{digits}} can purchase
maskBuyAlertWeekend: Today (weekend): Anyone who didn't purchase a mask during weekday
